name: Melody's DEVTOBER 2019 Demo
description:
My 2019 Devtober demo! It's short, but development will continue. Feedback appreciated! :)

Controls:

  • [Arrow Keys] or [AWSD] to move, jump, and fall through platforms.
  • [Left Mouse] or [N] to Punch. Attack quickly for a 3 hit combo!
  • [Right Mouse] or [M] to shoot a small ranged attack. (Uses Power)
  • HOLD down the shoot button until charged for a big ranged attack! (Uses Power)

This game is a continuation of my "Weekly Game Jam" series. You can check out the rest of the games on my main page. As for Melody herself, here are the 3 previous games that she either appears or stars in:

First appearance: https://shibeyfacegames.itch.io/dragon-agility

First playable role: https://shibeyfacegames.itch.io/melodys-dream

Second playable role, and direct precursor to my Devtober project: https://shibeyfacegames.itch.io/melodys-nightmare
